Title: Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original manga "Dragon Ball"), Takao Koyama (screenplay)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Takeshi Kusao, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: A mysterious being named Hoy arrives on Earth and asks the Z Warriors to use the dragon balls to help him release Tapion. Tapion, an ancient warrior imprisoned in a music box, and Hoy needs...
